mapper.sql: id, `name`, description, `path`, parent_id, `status`, sort, create_time, create_id, update_time, update_id, `type`
mapper.insert:
insert into t_permission (`name`, description, `path`, parent_id, `status`, sort, create_time, create_id, update_time, update_id, `type`) values
(#{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.type,jdbcType=TINYINT})
